import { Form, Link, NavLink, useRouteLoaderData } from "react-router-dom"; import styles from "./NavBar.module.css"; import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; const NavBar = () => { const data = useRouteLoaderData("root"); const currentUser = data.user; const listCart = useSelector((state) => state.cart.listCart); const [total, setTotal] = useState(0); if (!listCart) { setTotal(0); return; } listCart.forEach((cart) => { setTotal((prevState) => (prevState += +cart.quantity)); }); return ( <>
isActive ? styles["active"] : undefined } > Home isActive ? styles["active"] : undefined } > Shop
Boutique
isActive ? styles["active"] : undefined } > Cart {total} {!currentUser && ( isActive ? styles["active"] : undefined } > Login )} {currentUser && ( <> {currentUser.name.split(" ")[0]}
)}
); }; export default NavBar;
